verse.name: v1
verse.lines: King of my life, I crown Thee now, Thine shall the glory be; Lest I forget Thy thorn-crowned brow, Lead me to Calvary.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Show me the tomb where Thou wast laid, Tenderly mourned and wept; Angels in robes of light arrayed Guarded Thee whilst Thou slept.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let me, like Mary, thro' the gloom, Come with a gift to Thee; Show to me now the empty tomb, Lead me to Calvary.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: May I be willing, Lord, to bear Daily my cross for Thee; Even Thy cup of grief to share, Thou hast borne all for me.
